Vol. 3 has statements of responsibility: By Wendy and Richard Pini ; art by Wendy Pini ; colors by Wendy Pini with Joe Barruso, M. Lucie Chin, and Jane Fancher ; with commentary by Boris Vallejo and Lynn Abbey ; afterwords by Wendy and Richard Pini ; edited by Kay Reynolds.
